title: Incorporate elements of Christakis's "Blueprint" into "Human Rights as OS" chapter
description: There is a striking resemblance between the "universal" features of successful human societies highlighted by Nicholas Christakis in his book _Blueprint_ and the areas of rights we develop in the Freedom section.  It would be good to cite and highlight this, without to  heavily endorsing Christakis's highly universalistic perspective which is in some tension with broader themes of the book.
